overview: Chloé returns after partying. Lázaro, on the other hand, begins his day. Both have different lives, they don't even know each other, but they have a common problem. How far does their freedom go? Behind The Door is a social criticism that tries to show the reality of many people who daily suffer the consequences of the lack of freedom in any of its forms.
tagline: How far does your freedom go?
title: Behind The Door
